review.reviewBody:
The Karahi Chicken was superb.
But the mango lassi was ok ok.
The is difference in the consistency on lassi and chass.. it was a lassi with consistency of chass..
some of the best butter chicken that I have ever had
Amazing food every time we order!
very poor quality, since it was veg noodles, it had non veg smell alot, poor quality,  will not recommend or ever visit or order is future.
The Channa was horrible like running water in it.
